title: Tired of normals? want more special game modes? see here :)
body: howdy, if you are looking to relax more and not stress of your normal 5v5 meta games, then feel free to add me and join my club, currently at 21 members looking to completely fill, we do prefer bronze-silver players as our highest players are gold, but not set in stone, we try out silly strats alot like 5 top, all supports, all random champs, wombos, 3 junglers, stuff like that, and some normal games too, just to spice up the game again, no commitments, discord not required but welcome, at full club will be looking to do competitions with prizes, add if interested :)

replies.body: Sounds really interesting. It's not for me, but *definitely* a great idea :D

Sounds great
I'd love to join! I am a supp main, with my secondary being top, but i can play any lane. I love games within this game. I'd love to join. Im not in OCE though, I'm not sure if that matters or what OCE even means. (Gasp) Is that the name of the club? If you want to contact me my email is filburn2016@gmail.com.
um oce is the server na is america so you would have to make a new account hahaha
